nodes.text: An intelligence agent who worked for the Galactic Empire filed a report on the mercenary group known as the Aurodium Sword. The agent included an image of the group, which depicted the rogue ARC trooper known as Muzzle, the Wookiee Snoova, and another Wookiee defending a Sullustan business executive from an assassination attempt. The report and image made their way to Commander Maximillian Seerdon of the Imperial Security Bureau, who included both the report and image in a dossier on underworld figures he compiled in 0 ABY. The report kept the agent's identity classified.
